page.title: 04JOB OPPORTUNITIES-HOCKWOLD
page.content: The area offers only a small amount of {employment:}school-4 teachers 3 part-time domestics; shops-5 part-time assistants; pubs-1 part-time domestic; village club-1 steward; farms-2 agric. workers. {Self-employed}persons resident in the area owning a business working inside the area and beyond: 1 plumber,3 builders,1 decorator, 2 taxi drivers,1 window-cleaner,1 part time chimney-sweep & 1 undertaker.{ {Self-employed}persons working solely inside the area owning a business: 2 car-mechanics,7 shop-keepers,2 family farms & 1 publican. Other residents seeking employment{travel}to nearby towns and industrial sites, someto the U.S.A. Bases, two of which are in close proximity.
